exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="gameOverSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">

	<e:Group id="resultGroup" width="449" height="495" y="97" x="16">
		<e:Image source="noticeBg_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Image id="result" source="succeededNotice_png" y="178" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="gamePlayingSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="bg_png" x="0" y="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="bg1" source="bg_png" x="0" y="-800" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="roadblock" source="startLine_png" x="80" y="416" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="carlight" source="carLight_png" x="281" y="450" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="hero" source="hero_png" x="288" y="486" locked="true"/>
	<e:Group id="carLayer" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image id="distanceBg" source="roadnumBg_png" y="52" right="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="timeBg" source="timenumBg_png" y="52" left="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="distanceNum" x="353" y="88" font="roadnum_fnt" text="0" width="167" height="44" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" locked="true"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="timeNum" x="77" y="90" width="226" height="41" font="timenum_fnt" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" locked="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="gameStartSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="bg_png" width="480" x="0" height="800" y="0" locked="true" />
	<e:Image id="roadblock" source="startLine_png" x="80" y="416" locked="true" />
	<e:Image id="hero" source="hero_png" x="287" y="488" locked="true" />
	<e:Image id="carlight" source="carLight_png" x="281" y="450" locked="true" />
	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="loadingUISkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="loadingBg" source="loadingBg_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Group id="loadingGroup" width="85" height="74" x="79" y="333">
		<e:Image source="loadingCar_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Label id="loadingText" text="0%" top="0" size="29" width="64" x="19"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
